description: Display of two digital 55-inch display screens, one on each side of the InLink Unit
decision_conditions: The proposed advertisement display by virtue of its size, siting and design would be visually intrusive creating an incongruous addition to the streetscene detracting from the character and appearance of the surrounding area. The proposal would accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
Representations: 3 surrounding owner/occupiers were notified of the proposals. No responses have been received.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate works to reduce and maintain a large tree to prevent further failure and associated damage.Recommendation:no objections.
